meanings.definition: The act or process of planning and scheduling a series of actions or events.
meanings.sent1: Her programing of the party included games and music.
meanings.sent2: The team's programing of the project timeline was efficient.
meanings.sent3: His programing of the family vacation was a hit with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The programing of the school play was like orchestrating a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The programing of the event made it unforgettable for all attendees.

meanings.definition: The act or process of writing code for a computer program.
meanings.sent1: Learning programing can help you create amazing software.
meanings.sent2: Her job involves a lot of programing for different applications.
meanings.sent3: The robot's programing seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: His programing skills turned the complex problem into a simple solution.
meanings.sent5: The programing of the website was flawless and user-friendly.

meanings.definition: A planned series of events or activities.
meanings.sent1: The programing for the festival included music, food, and games.
meanings.sent2: Their programing of the summer camp was well-received by the kids.
meanings.sent3: The programing of the talent show had everyone laughing and cheering.
meanings.sent4: Her programing of the charity event brought in a record amount of donations.
meanings.sent5: The programing of the conference kept the attendees engaged and inspired.
